{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:04.960
    | text      = There's no passion behind this, nor is there any focus, which are key for wrestling promos to work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:09.960
    | text      = One of the greatest promos in WWF history was from King of the Ring 1996,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:14.960
    | text      = after Stone Cold Steve Austin had just defeated Jake the Snake to win the King of the Ring tournament.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:19.960
    | text      = Let's listen to this promo, and then I'm going to lay out the ways in which this promo is successful and Owen's is not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:26.960
    | text      = Oh, God.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:27.960
    | text      = This is just a backdoor to first you to...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:29.960
    | text      = Alex, get back in studio. Alex, get back in studio. I never thought I'd say that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:33.960
    | text      = The first thing I want to be done is to get that piece of crap out of my ring.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:38.960
    | text      = Oh, come on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:42.960
    | text      = Don't just get him out of the ring, get him out of the WWF.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:46.960
    | text      = Because I approve, son, without a shadow of a doubt, you ain't got what he takes anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:24:54.960
    | text      = You sit there, and you thump your Bible, and you say your prayers, and it didn't get you anywhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:02.960
    | text      = Talk about your Psalms, talk about John 3.16.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:06.960
    | text      = Austin 3.16 says, I just whipped your ass.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:11.960
    | text      = He is Stone Cold.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:14.960
    | text      = All he's got to do is go buy him a cheap bottle of Thunderbird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:17.960
    | text      = All right, stop it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:18.960
    | text      = And try to get back some of that courage he had in his prime, and say, King of the Ring,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:25.960
    | text      = I'm serving notice to every one of the WWF superstars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:30.960
    | text      = I don't give a damn what they are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:32.960
    | text      = They're all on the list, and that's Stone Cold's list, and I'm fixing to start running through all of them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:39.960
    | text      = All right, Stone Cold Steve Austin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:41.960
    | text      = And his remarks, 1996 WWF King of the Ring.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:46.960
    | text      = This championship match is considered, son.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:48.960
    | text      = I don't give a damn if it's Davey Boy Smith or Shawn Michaels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:52.960
    | text      = Steve Austin's time has come, and when I get the shot, you're looking at the next WWF champion,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:58.960
    | text      = and that's the bottom line.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:00.960
    | text      = Look how Stone Cold said so.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:03.960
    | text      = So there's music hits.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:05.960
    | text      = At the beginning there, Stone Cold begins by trashing Jake the Snake, because he's saying he's washed up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:11.960
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:12.960
    | text      = That's kind of a better version of Owen just saying that Darren McBreen is old,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:15.960
    | text      = because Stone Cold adds layers, you know, to the words that he's saying to impart meaning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:23.960
    | text      = Jake the Snake was a really religious character, so Stone Cold used that to create his Austin 3-16 catchphrase.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:29.960
    | text      = Jake was a recovering alcoholic, so he brought up the idea of a bottle of Thunderbird,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:33.960
    | text      = giving him back his confidence that he'd lost.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:35.960
    | text      = These are ways of saying that your opponent is old and washed up without saying something so boring as just, you're old.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:41.960
    | text      = That makes the promo compelling, because Stone Cold is painting a picture with words instead of just saying them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:46.960
    | text      = After trashing his fallen opponent, Stone Cold serves notice to the wide array of wrestlers he's getting ready to beat up later.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:52.960
    | text      = This is how you do it when your goal is to pump yourself up against a non-specific opponent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:57.960
    | text      = Since Stone Cold doesn't know who he's fighting next at this point, this isn't anything other than just self-aggrandizing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:04.960
    | text      = I'm better than everyone kind of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:06.960
    | text      = You notice how he doesn't say, like, Davey Boy Smith, he's old, John Michael's hair weighs too much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:11.960
    | text      = No, he doesn't waste his time on boring insults, choosing instead to make passing reference to them while focused on how he's the best and his time has come.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:20.960
    | text      = That would have been great if Stone Cold was like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:22.960
    | text      = And a lot of people think that there's a woman in the back who doesn't weigh as much as me who can do this, and that ain't the truth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:31.960
    | text      = She's like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:33.960
    | text      = But I'm better.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:34.960
    | text      = I'm better.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:35.960
    | text      = So, in wrestling promos, you really only want to talk about shit about somebody else if they're your opponent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:41.960
    | text      = Otherwise, things get a little bit confusing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:43.960
    | text      = Promos are supposed to supplement existing storylines.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:46.960
    | text      = In the case of Stone Cold, he just won the King of the Ring tournament and was getting a title shot,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:50.960
    | text      = so it makes sense for him to shit on the guy he just beat and let everyone know that it's his time and no one else can beat him moving forward.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:57.960
    | text      = Naturally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:58.960
    | text      = The flip side of this kind of promo is best exemplified by what I would call my favorite promo of all time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:04.960
    | text      = The Hard Times promo, delivered by Dusty Rhodes back in 1985.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:08.960
    | text      = At the time, Dusty had just returned from an injury he'd suffered at the hands of Ric Flair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:13.960
    | text      = He was finally getting a chance for payback, so the promo is specifically targeted at Ric Flair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:19.960
    | text      = Let's listen to this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:21.960
    | text      = This is Ken Burns wrestling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:24.960
    | text      = I would like to thank the many, many fans throughout this country that wrote cards and letters to Dusty Rhodes, the American Dream, while I was down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:35.960
    | text      = Secondly, I want to thank Jim Crockett Promotions for waiting and taking the time because I know how important it was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:42.960
    | text      = Star K85, it is to the resident fans, it is to Jim Crockett Promotions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:46.960
    | text      = And Dusty Rhodes, the American Dream, with that weight, got what I wanted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:53.960
    | text      = Ric Flair, the world's heavyweight champion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:57.960
    | text      = I don't have to say a lot more about the way I feel about Ric Flair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:02.960
    | text      = No respect, no honor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:05.960
    | text      = There is no honor among thieves in the first place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:08.960
    | text      = He put hard times on Dusty Rhodes and his family.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:12.960
    | text      = You don't know what hard times are, Daddy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:15.960
    | text      = Hard times are when the textile workers around this country are out of work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:19.960
    | text      = They got four or five kids and can't pay their wages, can't buy their food.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:24.960
    | text      = Hard times are when the auto workers are out of work and they tell them, go home.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:29.960
    | text      = And hard times are when a man has worked on a job 30 years, 30 years, they give him a watch, kick him in the butt, and say, hey, a computer took your place, Daddy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:41.960
    | text      = That's hard times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:43.960
    | text      = That's hard times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:46.960
    | text      = And Ric Flair, you put hard times on this country by taking Dusty Rhodes out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:53.960
    | text      = That's hard times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:55.960
    | text      = And we all had hard times together.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:58.960
    | text      = I admit I don't look like the athlete of the day, supposed to look.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:02.960
    | text      = My belly's just a little big, my hand is just a little big, but, brother, I am bad and they know I'm bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:09.960
    | text      = And there were two bad people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:11.960
    | text      = One was John Wayne and he's dead, brother.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:15.960
    | text      = Nature boy Ric Flair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:18.960
    | text      = The world's heavyweight title belongs to these people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:22.960
    | text      = I'm going to reach out right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:24.960
    | text      = I want you at home to know my hand is touching your hand for this gathering of the biggest body of people in this country, in this universe, all over the world now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:36.960
    | text      = I want you to reach it out because the love that was given me in this time, I will repay you now because I will be the next world's heavyweight champion on this hard time blues.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:51.960
    | text      = Dusty Rhodes tore 85 and Ric Flair, nature boy, let me leave you with this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:05.960
    | text      = One way to hurt Ric Flair is to take what he cherishes more than anything in the world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:12.960
    | text      = That's the world's heavyweight title.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:14.960
    | text      = I'm going to take it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:31:15.960

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:17.960
    | text      = This time when I take it, daddy, I'm going to take it for you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:21.960
    | text      = Let's gather for it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:23.960
    | text      = Don't let me down now because I came back for you, for that man up there that died 10, 12 years ago and never got the opportunity to see a real wolf champion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:38.960
    | text      = I'm proud of you and thank God I have you and I love you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:41.960
    | text      = Love you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:43.960
    | text      = Amazing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:44.960
    | text      = Just amazing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:45.960
    | text      = Wasn't that the transcript of Obama's 2004 DNC address?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:49.960
    | text      = Wasn't that the keynote there?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:51.960

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:53.960
    | text      = George W. Bush put us in hot times, daddy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:58.960
    | text      = But even if you're not a wrestling fan, you can recognize the brilliance of something like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:02.960
    | text      = That's fantastic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:03.960
    | text      = Come on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:04.960
    | text      = There's creativity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:05.960
    | text      = There's union organizing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:06.960
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:07.960
    | text      = Well, I mean, one part of Dusty Rhodes' big gimmick was the common man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:10.960
    | text      = Sure, sure, sure, sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:11.960
    | text      = And so he's a little plumber's son.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:12.960
    | text      = Naturally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:13.960
    | text      = Naturally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:14.960
    | text      = That kind of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:15.960
    | text      = So everyone knows that Owen and Alex are going to be arguing over this stupid belt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:18.960
    | text      = So it makes no sense that Owen didn't just cut a promo on Alex the way that Dusty did on Ric Flair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:24.960
    | text      = No one thinks that the payoff of this is going to be, like, Owen...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:28.960
    | text      = Daria's going to get her ass kicked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:30.960
    | text      = I have bad news about the payoff of this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:34.960
    | text      = But anyway, what works so well about the Hard Times promo is that it elevates what's at stake about the Dusty Rhodes-Ric Flair fight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:41.960
    | text      = It's not just about who's champ.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:43.960
    | text      = It's about Ric Flair injuring Dusty and Dusty coming back because he loves the fans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:47.960
    | text      = He connects with the audience and makes the viewer feel invested in him winning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:51.960
    | text      = He brings pathos to the feud by comparing his being injured and unable to work to the everyday person out there who got laid off or worked 30 years and got a watch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:00.960
    | text      = He's making himself someone that the audience can project their own feelings onto and relate to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:05.960
    | text      = You want to root for Dusty and watch him beat up Ric Flair because he's elevated this into being himself being a stand-in for you or someone you know,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:13.960
    | text      = fighting against the cruel, faceless business that exploits us all as represented by Ric Flair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:19.960
    | text      = Naturally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:20.960
    | text      = It's a very simple thing, masterfully executed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:22.960
    | text      = Within a matter of a couple minutes, you have just, like, every, like, just amazing storytelling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:28.960
    | text      = Yeah, it's fantastic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:29.960
    | text      = Compare that to what Owen's doing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:31.960
    | text      = He's just saying he can do a lot of push-ups.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:33.960
    | text      = So what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:34.960
    | text      = There are tons of examples of wrestlers who do cocky gimmicks, you know, like the whole thing is that they're cocky.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:39.960
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:40.960
    | text      = They're usually the villains, and the whole point of their act is to play up the annoying characteristics of a cocky asshole so you as the viewer really want to see the guy you don't like get beaten up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:50.960
    | text      = So, like, ravishing Rick Rude, he was obsessed with his body, Ted DiBiase always bragged about being a millionaire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:56.960
    | text      = These were things that they played up to make it more satisfying to see them get their comeuppance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:01.960
    | text      = In terms of being a cocky heel, Owen's even failing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:04.960
    | text      = The other thing that Dusty does amazingly well is that he never says that Ric Flair sucks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:09.960
    | text      = This is so important in good wrestling promos, because if your whole argument is that your opponent sucks, you've ruined the idea of the fight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:16.960
    | text      = If you're saying your opponent sucks and then you win, so what? You've beat someone who sucks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:21.960
    | text      = If you lose, then you just lost to someone who sucks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:24.960
    | text      = It's not a good way to build towards a fight, and good practitioners are able to put themselves over and simultaneously put over their opponent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:31.960
    | text      = They're like, hey, you know what, you're really good, but I'm better.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:34.960
    | text      = That kind of thing is essential, or else why? What are the stakes here?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:38.960
    | text      = Because Owen fails to even do this, he's basically setting up a boring as hell pushup contest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:43.960
    | text      = All of his opponents are trash, so why do this?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:46.960
    | text      = Yeah, I'm going to do twice as many pushups as the other people in my office.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:51.960
    | text      = It's a lame thing to do, even if you're not on a radio show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:57.960
    | text      = It's pretty lame.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:58.960
    | text      = Yeah, if you're just in a regular office and you're like, hey man, I bet I could do a bunch more pushups than everybody, everybody would be like, fuck off, you suck.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:04.960
    | text      = And if you're in a radio show, that's a million times worse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:08.960
    | text      = It's clearly a situation where they're like, let's do a play on wrestling, let's do a play on the WWE, and they just didn't think through any of the ways they could make it good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:17.960
    | text      = Well, you would have to think it through.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:19.960
    | text      = It's shockingly embarrassing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:21.960
    | text      = You'd have to start with work, and they don't do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:23.960
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:24.960
    | text      = So, the end.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:25.960
    | text      = So, some people, maybe even you, Jordan, are thinking that this has gone on too long, and they're probably right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:30.960
    | text      = I only wanted to lay all this out because this is one of the parts of wrestling that I like the most, the storytelling aspect of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:36.960
    | text      = There are little nuances to how really good wrestlers tell a story through the build of their fights that people often don't understand at all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:43.960
    | text      = People just think that wrestling is people fake punching each other and then occasionally yelling into microphones, and that's pretty unfair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:50.960
    | text      = Also, I'm making a big point about this because it's clearly a planned bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:54.960
    | text      = They have a replica belt just for this segment.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Infowars has every opportunity to prepare and actually try to do something decent here, and this is what they come up with.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:06.960
    | text      = They're trying to ape the style of an art form they don't understand and have no respect for, and it just comes off really embarrassing.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:12.960
    | text      = No, no, no. It came off great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:14.960
    | text      = He's a brilliant broadcaster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:36:16.960

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Yeah, it's not good. It's not good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I think that probably there's a recognition or some kind of a feeling that a lot of people in Alex's audience might be wrestling fans,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Job done.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Nothing is worse than a corporate entity taking over and just not patronizing.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:56.960
    | text      = Just such a disrespect for you. If you like wrestling here, you'll like this shit.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = The June 12th episode of The War Room opens up with Owen in a t-shirt and the replica belt on the desk next to him.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Brilliant.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:47.960

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:40.960

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
